nodes.text: An Apple was a type of fruit found in various locations throughout the galaxy. Almakian apples were found on the planet Almak. It was used in All-Almakian apple pie, a favorite dish of the Leffingite species. Corellian apples were found on the planet Corellia. Geldan sun-apples were found in the Gelda system, and were used as a syrup to flavour fizzyglug beverages. The Gor apple was a type that became wrinkled when dried, with Gab'borah Hise's face resembling one. Groundapple was used in a drink with dew flower once consumed by Mara Jade Skywalker in the Sanvia Vitajuice Bar on the planet Coruscant.
The earliest mention of an apple was the Geldan sun-apple in Riders of the Maelstrom, a 1996 roleplaying game book.
